channel.title: Tips and suggestions
channel.description:
To start, I don't know if this is the right forum section for this or not so please tell me if this is the wrong section. So, basically I started work on a custom RSPS Base. I'm posting to get any tips and/or suggestions anyone would be willing to give me about the software code, setup, etc. The source can be found on Github located here, [url=https://github.com/creatorfromhell/Evolution]https://github.com/creatorfromhell/Evolution[/url].
*edit* Some people may be asking "Why does he want suggestions or tips so early on?" The answer to that is, because in my opinion it's easier to add suggestions early on so I can sorta judge the direction to take it in the future.
Notes:
[ul][li]The server is not in a stable/runnable state[/li] [li]No packets are handled at the moment.[/li] [li]I've setup basic NIO Connection Handling.[/li] [li]I'm leaning towards a multi-world approach(if possible)[/li] [li]If you want to contribute and have a Github Account you can make a Pull Request.[/li] [li]If you want to contribute and do not have a Github Account you can make your edits then post a link to Pastebin, dropbox, or what you prefer to use.[/li][/ul]

item.title: Tips and suggestions
item.dc:creator: @neonrainbowrabbit neonrainbowrabbit
item.description:
@neonrainbowrabbit wrote:

Clawz fury:

do a bit more… nothing I can really ‘suggest’. looks like a basic NIO gameserver lol

As stated, it’s just the NIO Connection Handling at the moment. No packets are sent or anything, but I have lots of feature ideas I want to include in the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Tips and suggestions
item.dc:creator: @neonrainbowrabbit neonrainbowrabbit
item.description:
@neonrainbowrabbit wrote:

Elrick:

I can give you content suggestions, but I don’t know jack about coding.

Cool!There isn’t really much I can ask you for at the moment. Well, what would you think of multi-world support?

Read full topic

item.title: Tips and suggestions
item.dc:creator: @neonrainbowrabbit neonrainbowrabbit
item.description:
@neonrainbowrabbit wrote:

To start, I don’t know if this is the right forum section for this or not so please tell me if this is the wrong section. So, basically I started work on a custom RSPS Base. I’m posting to get any tips and/or suggestions anyone would be willing to give me about the software code, setup, etc. The source can be found on Github located here, https://github.com/creatorfromhell/Evolution.

edit Some people may be asking “Why does he want suggestions or tips so early on?” The answer to that is, because in my opinion it’s easier to add suggestions early on so I can sorta judge the direction to take it in the future.

Notes:

[ul][li]The server is not in a stable/runnable state[/li]
[li]No packets are handled at the moment.[/li]
[li]I’ve setup basic NIO Connection Handling.[/li]
[li]I’m leaning towards a multi-world approach(if possible)[/li]
[li]If you want to contribute and have a Github Account you can make a Pull Request.[/li]
[li]If you want to contribute and do not have a Github Account you can make your edits then post a link to Pastebin, dropbox, or what you prefer to use.[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
